index.index.main.p1: Hi! I'm Autumn64, a CE major from México. This is the place where I share my hobbies.
index.index.main.table.p5: Articles and books in Spanish and Esperanto
index.index.main.h12: Follow me on my social media

about.about.main.p1: I'm Mónica, and I was born in 2004 in Mexico City. My main interests are technology (especially Free Software), science, music, history, and linguistics. I'm currently working as a freelancer web developer, and I also sometimes do sysadmin.
about.about.main.p2: My hobbies include digital drawing, making music, learning new languages, and basically making and writing useless but funny stuff!
about.about.main.ul.li2: I'm a trans woman, and my pronouns are she/her.
about.about.main.ul.li3: I speak Spanish, English, Esperanto and some French.
about.about.main.ul.li4: I consider myself as a neopagan, and I'm particularly interested in eclectic witchcraft.
about.about.main.ul.li5: I consider myself a queer anarcho-communist.
about.about.main.ul.li6: I care about the environment. We only got one Earth!
about.about.main.ul.li7: I prefer to eat halal or vegan when possible (because finding such kinds of food is rather difficult or expensive in my country).
about.about.main.ul.li8: I love the Fediverse! It's pretty much the only place on the Internet where I really feel comfortable.
about.about.main.ul.li9: I'm a Free Software activist, and sometimes upload long and short videos about it on the Internet.
about.about.main.ul.li10: I'm currently using Debian (after 4 years of using Arch Linux btw).
about.about.main.ul.li11: My main interest is backend development, and I'm currently learning Flask and PHP. As for frontend, I feel comfortable with Bootstrap and I'd like to learn Svelte.
about.about.main.ul.li12: I have a portfolio where I upload some nice web projects.
about.about.main.ul.li13: Foods: Ramen, Tacos de canasta, Bread.
about.about.main.ul.li15: Movies: Interstellar, K-Pop Demon Hunters, the Star Wars saga.
about.about.main.ul.li17: Songs: GOLDEN by HUNTR/X, CACTUS by TWICE, In Another World by EJAE.
about.about.main.ul.li19: Artists: AURORA, Silvio Rodríguez, The Beatles.
about.about.main.ul.li20: Programming Languages: C, Python, JS (I hate it but I like it lol).
about.about.main.ul.li21: GNU/Linux distros: Arch Linux btw, Debian, Linux Mint.

contact.contact.main.p1: Whether you wish to work with me, make a collab, give some feedback or simply send me a message, you can do it by any of the means of contact provided below. Thanks!

donate.donate.main.p1: If you like my work and want to donate, this is the place. It's not necessary, but greatly appreciated!

drawings.drawings.main.p1: Sometimes I like to make digital drawings. I'm still learning and my style isn't too good, but I still do it with love! <3

fediverse.fediverse.main.p1: These are my profiles on federated services (like the Fediverse or Matrix). Thanks for following!

foss.foss.main.p1: I sometimes upload long and short videos about Free Software and GNU/Linux.
foss.foss.main.h14: Follow me on my social media

huesitos.huesitos.main.h21: Game made as a project for the UVM National Engineering Forum 2024. (In Spanish)
huesitos.huesitos.main.h23: Support for Xbox, Playstation and Nintendo Switch controllers, and touch screens (EXPERIMENTAL) included.
huesitos.huesitos.main.h24: Code licensed under the AGPLv3. Sprites, tiles and scenarios licensed under the CC BY-NC-SA, music licensed under the CC BY.

services.services.main.p1: These services are based on Free Software, and I host them from a server provided by @categulario@mstdn.mx. Thanks so much for all the support!
services.services.main.section.div2.p1: Alternative frontend for Reddit, focused on privacy
